Class DefaultConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.config.DefaultConfig

  • public final class DefaultConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to work with the default users.

    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:

      • checkUser

        private static boolean checkUser()
        Checks a role of an authorized user. Authorized user must have the ADMIN role.
        Returns:
        true if an authorized user has the ADMIN role, false otherwise.

      • checkSuperUser

        private static boolean checkSuperUser()
        Checks a role of an authorized user. Authorized user must have the SUPERMAN role.
        Returns:
        true if an authorized user has the SUPERMAN role, false otherwise.

        Returns:
